name: Alex Vernacchia (@vernak@inane.chat)
summary:
I've just released v0.2.1 of my chrome extension called "Google Workspace Zoom Default," which helps people set a default zoom level for Google Docs and Sheets (maybe even some more in the future). You can find it at https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/google-workspace-zoom-def/nflkcdlimipkgbacnfnhfecjgmojhklo.

I also wrong about it on my blog (https://words.byvernacchia.com/blog/2023/03/introducing-google-workspace-zoom-default/).

Hope this helps you! It was really cool/easy to build with @plasmohq
